LKB

public LKB(boolean quicktest)
LKB constructor

Parameters:
quicktest - true to only load LKB for testing purposes, false to also load ERG and generate index (which takes a while).

getGenSentences

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getGenSentences()
Get generated sentences after calling sendMrxToGen Warning: this function can only be called once! calling more than once WILL BLOCK THE PROGRAM!

Returns:
an ArrayList of generated sentences in raw

doGeneration

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> doGeneration(java.lang.String mrx)
Send an MRS in XML and retrieve generated sentences

Parameters:
mrx -
Returns:
an ArrayList of generated sentences in raw

getMaxEntScores

public double[] getMaxEntScores()
If LOGON is used, then selective unpacking is enabled. Every generated sentence is assigned a score from an MaxEnt model. This function retrieves the scores.

Returns:
an array of double for scores, or none if LKB is used.

printMaxEntScores

public void printMaxEntScores()

getFailedGenSentences

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFailedGenSentences()
In case of a generation failure, send the (print-gen-summary) cmd to LKB to get all the excerpts of *gen-chart*

Returns:
an ArrayList containing all the edges of *gen-chart*

parseFailedGen

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parseFailedGen(java.lang.String raw)
From the cmd (print-gen-summary) LKB produces output like this: 
LKB(5): (print-gen-summary)
------
(Al Gore)
(AL GORE,)
(AL GORE.)
(AL GORE?)
(do)

NIL
LKB(6):
This function accepts a raw string like above and return the list of all strings inside ().

Parameters:
raw - a raw String from the cmd (print-gen-summary)
Returns:
a parsed ArrayList

sendMrxToGen

public void sendMrxToGen(java.lang.String mrx)
Send an MRX string to the LKB generator

Parameters:
mrx - A string containing an MRS in XML format

getErrResult

public java.lang.String getErrResult()
Get result from stderr. It seems LKB doesn't output anything to stderr. So using this function will block the whole program.

Returns:
the parsing result

exit

public void exit()
exit LKB
